title: Apertium | A free/open-source machine translation platform
Translation_Help: Choose two languages and translate your text using Apertium's translation platform!
Morphological_Analysis_Help: Choose a language and analyse your text using Apertium's morphological analysers.
Morphological_Generation_Help: Choose a language and generate surface forms from your text using Apertium's morphological generators.
Contact_Us: Feel free to contact us if you find a mistake, there's a project you would like to see us work on, or you would like to help out.
